description: Are you finding it difficult to start the conversation, or find the right words when communicating in English? Do you know how to start and end conversations in a polite way? Do you want to learn more about American, British, Canadian, Australian, South Korean, Colombian, and Chinese cultures? If so, you’ve come to the right course!
title: 30640014x: Conversational English Skills
instructors: Thomas H. Piachaud, Glenn M. Davis, Fang Yang and Wenxia Zhang
